values: A telescope is a tool people use to look at the stars.
With a telescope, you can see the moon and stars easily.
n. 望远镜；缩叠式旅行袋 vi. 套叠；变短 vt. 压缩；使套叠

- vt. 压缩某物使其少占空间或时间
